description: Transfer home movies and digital pictures to DVD, quickly and easily without a PC. Connect with virtually any camcorder, VCR, even DVR for recording video DVDs playable in standard DVD players. Built in slots accept the 5 most common memory cards for recording digital pictures to DVD as a slideshow or for photo storage. Record high definition AVCHD video from Sony HDD or Memory Stick Handycam camcorders to DVD playable in Blu-ray Disc compatible devices. In The Box - DVD Recorder (VRD-MC6); AC Adaptor; AC Power Cord; Warranty Card; Manual.
title: Sony VRDMC6 DVDirect Compact Size DVD Burner with AVCHD Recording
